name: h3
description: The 2025 DeMarini Prism+ Drop 11 Fastpitch Softball Bat is a game-changer for slap hitters seeking a balanced swing feel and unmatched performance. Certified for play across multiple leagues, including USSSA, ASA, NSA, ISA, and WBSC, this bat is designed with a 2 1/4 inch barrel diameter to enhance your hitting prowess. Featuring a seamless Gapped Wall Composite and Continuous Fiber Composite Barrel, it offers increased power and a larger sweet spot for those crucial hits. The Type V Prism+ Connection optimizes barrel performance, while the Refract End Cap boosts bat speed, making it perfect for players aiming for precision and power. With its striking black, white, and multi-colored design, the Prism+ series not only elevates your game but also your style on the field. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
